#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int t;
	long long x1,x2,y1,y2;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld %lld",&x1,&y1);
		scanf("%lld %lld",&x2,&y2);
		long long rowslefttox2 =x2-1;
		long long rowsrighttox2 =x1-x2;
		long long columnlefttoy2 =y2-1;
		long long columnrighttoy2 =y1-y2;
		long long m;
		if(rowslefttox2>rowsrighttox2)
		m=rowslefttox2;
		else
		m=rowsrighttox2;
		long long n;
		if(columnlefttoy2>columnrighttoy2)
		n=columnlefttoy2;
		else
		n=columnrighttoy2;
		printf("%lld\n",m+n);
	}
	return 0;
}
